author: Andrea C Chicago IL
title: Andrea C Chicago IL
text: Easy and reliable. They did everything they said they would and the order shipped on time and made it within 10 days. Very very professional and they exceeded expectations. Beautiful glasses, very classy. They're perfect!!!
